post:
We have been providing hosting services(dedicated server, VDS and cloud backups) since 2012. We own of the servers hardware and we have full control over quality and specifications, with own hardware we can provide server at affordable price. Our support clearly understand what needs to be done to keep your server healthy, fast and secure. We have own datacenter.

**Infrastructure**

We own our network and server hardware running in own datacenter in Romania consisting of:
•HPE Servers
•Fast DDR RAM with ECC
•Intel Enterprise SSD (DC S3520 Series)
•Seagate Enterprise SATA (Constellation Series)
•Intel Xeon CPUs(E5-2620v4, E5-2680v4, E5-2690v4)
•A+B Power
•BGP, Redundant Network
•Preheat generator to ensure a quick start even if the ambient temperature is negative,
•Temperature, humidity, access monitoring system
•Professional inert gas fire extinguishing systems NOVEC 1230,
•Cooling system with air conditioning and constant temperature maintenance.

**Network Tests**
[Speed test](https://speedtest.host-expert.com/)
AS number: [AS49645](https://bgp.he.net/AS49645)

**Payment**
•Major Credit Cards
•Paypal
•Bitcoin

**Additional Information**
•[FAQ](https://www.host-expert.eu/faq)
•[TOS](https://www.host-expert.eu/Terms_and_conditions-170.htm)


The offer is 50% off recurring for  [Best Performance Server](https://www.host-expert.eu/dedicated_servers/best_performance). This offer cannot be combined with another offer and can only be used for the best performance and options (extra RAM, extra SSD, additional SATA, anti DDOS, RAID hardware controller, hardware encryption). This offer cannot be used for additional IPs or other plans.This offer is valid within the limit of available stock. Use cupon code **BF_LET**.
